labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Windows 10 x64 Home Edition. Monitor: 1920x1080 @ http://i.imgur.com/oSQDvud.gifv 60
data.client_settings: Default Discord desktop program. Not in developer mode, and running version from 10.07.2017.
data.actual_result: The taskbar does not re-appear. The only way to get the taskbar back is to either Alt+Tab, or by pressing the Windows Key.
data.expected_result: The tasbar should re-appear when you hover at the bottom, like in all other programms.
data.short_description: When maximised and taskbar is automatically hidden, the taskbar doesn't re-appear.
data.steps_to_repro: - First make sure to have the taskbar set to automatically hide by right-clicking on the bar and going into its settings. - Maximise Discord. If you use multiple monitors, make sure to maximise Discord to the first (main); since on my end it doesn't work on my end when I do this to my second monitor - Try to use the taskbar by moving to the bottom most point of the screen. - A GIF to prove: <http://i.imgur.com/oSQDvud.gifv>
